summary: Allows player to fast travel from inside frequently visited places, like homes. In Oblivion you were able to fast travel from inside homes, so I thought, why not Skyrim, too? I also added a few more places that are visited often.
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE READ THE README FILE BEFORE TRYING TO INSTALL THIS MOD!!!

You can also find this on the Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/id/mbrmchll/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850

Allows player to fast travel from inside frequently visited places, like homes. In Oblivion you were able to fast travel from inside homes, so I thought, why not Skyrim, too? I also added a few more places that are visited often.

Places you can fast travel from:
-Breezehome
-Vlindrel Hall
-Honeyside
-Hjerim
-Proudspire Manor
-Ragged Flagon
-Ragged Flagon Cistern
-Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary
-Dawnstar Sanctuary
-Jorrvaskr (upstairs and downstairs)
-College of Winterhold
---Hall of Attainment
---Hall of Countenance
---Hall of the Elements
---Arch-Mage's Quarters
---The Arcanaeum
-High Hrothgar
-Sky Haven Temple

Added locations from Dawnguard:
-Fort Dawnguard
-Volkihar Keep

Locations from Hearthfire:
-Lakeview Manor
-Heljarchen Hall
-Windstad Manor

Locations from Dragonborn:
-Severin Manor
-Tel Mithryn


----FAQ----
Question: What makes this different than other mods that allow you to fast travel from interiors?
Answer: I didn't want to make a mod that breaks the game. I wanted to make one that allowed you to fast travel from inside places that you would know your way out of. The point of fast travelling is that you've been there before, so you know how to get there. So naturally, you've been inside your house, you know how to get out of it. I didn't want to add all caves and dungeons because I didn't want it to be a cheat mod. I wanted to make it kind of like an ease of access thing that would make sense in the world. Like I said in the description, I got the idea from Oblivion, which allowed you to fast travel from inside (most) of your homes.
author: mbrmchll
